Research On Knowing LLC

The practical application of epistemology to advance how we learn, understand and create things.

About Research On Knowing LLC

Epistemology within Philosophy is "the theory of knowledge, especially with regard to its methods, validity, and scope. Epistemology is the investigation of what distinguishes justified belief from opinion." (OxfordLanguages) We at Research on Knowing believe the practical application of epistemology can open our eyes and change our point of view. The invention of the telescope changed humanities ideas and understanding of the stars and planets. The microscope made visible an unimagined world within a drop of water. These are examples of how making visible what was previously hidden has revolutionized our knowledge. Computers and software have expanded our knowledge by revealing unseen truths. Research on Knowing employs these kinds of changes in viewpoint to explore how we learn, understand and create things.

Visit Site

Language of Languages (LoLs)

The reinvention of computer programming languages to create a paradigm shift within computing and software. Language of Languages employs an experimental language workbench to place the representation of software within the reach of developers. Domain specific languages can be created and modified. Software notational systems can be unified allowing developers to deplict large software projects with a representation that best fits the situation.

Visit Site

Dan's IT Cookbook

IT tasks are presented in a recipe format. Each recipe is described with clear goals and objectives. A list of ingredients details the unique information required to accomplish the task. A set of instructions show how the task is performed using example ingredient values. By using example values, recipes provide concrete illustrations of how the IT task should be carried out.
